description: Impress without the stress with this sushi recipe which uses an ice cube tray to give you perfect sushi cubes. They look stellar topped with strips of nori.
name: Simple Sushi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet nori, cut into 6 strips, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions. Allow to cool completely.
Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place schnitzel on tray and bake for 20 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Cut schnitzel into 28 pieces.

Lightly spray a 28-hole, 1-tbs capacity silicone ice cube tray with oil. Divide radish and cucumber among holes. Half-fill holes with rice, pressing firmly to compact. Top with a piece of chicken, then fill with remaining rice.
Turn sushi out onto a platter and top with nori. Serve with mayonnaise and soy sauce.
